# An example song using stereo 16-bit sounds

Song:
  Tempo: 120
  Flow:
    - Verse:   x2
    - Chorus:  x4
    - Verse:   x2
    - Chorus:  x4
  Kit:
    - bass:       ../../sounds/bass_stereo_16.wav
    - snare:      ../../sounds/snare_stereo_16.wav
    - hh_closed:  ../../sounds/hh_closed_stereo_16.wav
    - agogo:      ../../sounds/agogo_high_stereo_16.wav

Verse:
  - bass:       X...X...X...X...
  - snare:      ..............X.
  - hh_closed:  X.XXX.XX........
  - hh_closed:  ........X.X.X.X.
  - agogo:      ..............XX

# Also including non-Kit sounds to test that they work as well:
Chorus:
  - bass:                             X...X...XX..X...
  - snare:                            ....X.......X...
  - hh_closed:                        X.XXX.XX........
  - hh_closed:                        ........X.XX..X.
  - ../../sounds/tom4_stereo_16.wav:  ...........X....
  - ../../sounds/tom2_stereo_16.wav:  ..............X.
